```{r}
delta <- 1
gamma <- 1
beta  <- -2 # Causes masking and possibly "flipped" association

N <- 100000

X0 <- rnorm(N)
X1 <- beta*X0 + rnorm(N)
X2 <- delta*X0 + gamma*X1 + rnorm(N)
```

```{r}
confint(lm(X2 ~ X0))[2, ]
beta*gamma + delta

confint(lm(X2 ~ X0 + X1))[2, ]
delta
```

```{r}
confint(lm(X2 ~ X1))[2, ]
(beta*delta + (beta^2 + 1)*gamma)/(beta^2 + 1)

confint(lm(X2 ~ X1 + X0))[2, ]
gamma
```
